a handle, the handle on the newly created Axes entity

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: newaxes() is used to create a new Axes entity (see graphics_entities) in the current figure by default. The properties of this entity are inherited from the default_axes entity (see gda)
newaxes(h) creates the axes in the frame uicontrol or figure whose handle is h.
